projects.name: Engaging with Children's Artwork in Mixed Visual-Ability Families
projects.details: Understanding the role of technology in enabling BLV family members to engage more meaningfully with children's 2D visual creations

projects.name: AltGeoViz: Facilitating Accessible Geovisualization
projects.details: Dynamically generated alt-text descriptions for map views, providing summaries of spatial patterns and descriptive statistics
